title: [i18next] Prototype pollution attack

profile.name: Node.js third-party modules
profile.about: This program was used to handle vulnerabilities in the Node.js ecosystem.

activities.message:
not sure if anything happened, but it was fixed a while ago: https://github.com/i18next/i18next/commit/ed6169fa21b67d8e73b20d82579aff6f9b808a69

should be fixed since v19.8.3
